thread.title: BRIEF-Vistra Energy Its Unit Entered Into Amendment To That Certain Credit Agreement, Dated As Of Oct 3, 2016

title: BRIEF-Vistra Energy Its Unit Entered Into Amendment To That Certain Credit Agreement, Dated As Of Oct 3, 2016
text: Market News  34 AM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Vistra Energy Its Unit Entered Into Amendment To That Certain Credit Agreement, Dated As Of Oct 3, 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 23 (Reuters) - Vistra Energy Corp: * VISTRA ENERGY CORP SAYS EFFECTIVE FEB 20, ITS UNIT ENTERED INTO AMENDMENT TO THAT CERTAIN CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF OCTOBER 3, 2016 - SEC FILING * VISTRA ENERGY-AS RESULT OF AMENDMENT, INTEREST RATE ON OUTSTANDING $990 MILLION 2016 INCREMENTAL TERM LOANS, REVOLVING CREDIT LOANS WAS REDUCED * VISTRA ENERGY-REPRICING AMENDMENT DID NOT CHANGE INTEREST RATE ON OUTSTANDING $2.821 BILLION INITIAL TERM LOANS,OUTSTANDING $500 MLNINITIAL TERM C LOANS Source text : ( bit.ly/2osxM3g )
